definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † II. [[[חָנַן]]] be loathsome (cf. Ar. xan=a x. foetorem emisit (puteus); Syr. h.aniyno0 rancid);—only [[וְחַנּׁתִ֫י לִבְנֵי בִטְנִי]] Job 19:17 and I am loath-some to the sons of my womb (‖ [[זׇרָה]] v. II. [[זור]]), so RVm Ew De Di al. (On the tone v. De.)
